name: Color Fuse Talc-Free Blush Powder With Fermented Arnica
about: What it is:...Finish:..Formulation:..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Fermented Arnica: Visibly reduces redness and irritation.- Hydraberry: Extracted from red raspberries, delivers immediate and long range skin hydration and supports the skin barrier.- Plant Squalane: Nourishes and softens skin..Ingredient Callouts:...What Else You Need to Know:...Research Results:.....
ingredients: -Fermented Arnica: Protects against environmental stress..-Vitamins C and E: Skin feels protected and conditioned..-Plant Squalane: Skin feels nourished and soft. ..Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Squalane, Silica, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sorbitan Isostearate, C20-24 Alkyl Dimethicone, Arnica Montana Flower Extract**, Pseudozyma Epicola/Sunflower Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Kaolin, C20-24 Olefin, Zinc Stearate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Mica, Aluminium Hydroxide, Alumina, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 77007 (Ultramarines)...**Fermented...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use the Haus Labs Dual-Ended Multi-Purpose Brush (sold separately) to apply and diffuse..-Build for intensity..-For an even more radiant, dimensional finish, top with any shade of Bio-Radiant Gel-Powder Highlighter with Fermented Arnica (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite blushes! These layer so nicely with the blush sticks, too. The color is pigmented, it actually stays, and blends well. All I can ask for! French rosette is the perfect year round staple.
